name: Together Separately
description:
Hi,

I made this game for Cutie Jam 1 in roughly 3 days :)

The game is about 3 friends playing an adventure game together. And you as the player solve three Quests in this Adventure game. So it´s basically a game inside a game (Gameception).

The playtime is roughly 9 minutes, it´s SFW and probably fine for children.

Feedback / Critique is always welcome! The Project files are uploaded for the curious RPG Maker MZ Fellows.

I really hope you enjoy/enjoyed the game and have a good time.

Cheers

Wesley
